Kon Ham Where I write about everything

Good Night [Poetry]

11 Jan 2021

In the twilight, a quiet moment –

my footsteps now the loudest creature of the night.

The dark and vast velvet of the sky looks down at me

without critique, without judgement –

only silence and acceptance.
